00026 #define DEBUG_FUNCTION_CALLS() printf("%s @ %s:%d\n",__FUNCTION__,__FILE__,__LINE__);

00028 static const bool debugConstructors = false;
00029 
00030 PlanePolygon::PlanePolygon() : normals2D(0), edgeDir2D(0), edgeLengths(0), offsets2D(0), pixelLocs(0), vertices(0), vertices2D(0) 
00031 {
00032   if(debugConstructors) printf("start of %s\n",__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00033   normal.zero();
00034   offset = 0.0;
00035   b1.zero();
00036   b2.zero();
00037   p0.zero();
00038   numPoints = 0.0;
00039   validPolygon = false;
00040 }
00041 
00042 PlanePolygon::PlanePolygon(vector< vector3f > points) : normals2D(0), edgeDir2D(0), edgeLengths(0), offsets2D(0), pixelLocs(0), vertices(0), vertices2D(0) 
00043 {
00044   if(debugConstructors) printf("start of %s\n",__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00045   numPoints = points.size();
00046   validPolygon = computePlaneParameters(points);
00047   if(validPolygon)
00048     validPolygon = constructConvexPoly(points);
00049   pixelLocs.clear();
00050   if(debugConstructors) printf("end of %s\n",__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00051 }
00052 
00053 PlanePolygon::PlanePolygon(vector< vector3f > points, vector< vector2i > _pixelLocs) : normals2D(0), edgeDir2D(0), edgeLengths(0), offsets2D(0), pixelLocs(0), vertices(0), vertices2D(0)
00054 {
00055   if(debugConstructors) printf("start of %s\n",__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00056   numPoints = points.size();
00057   validPolygon = computePlaneParameters(points);
00058   if(validPolygon)
00059     validPolygon = constructConvexPoly(points);
00060   pixelLocs = _pixelLocs;
00061   if(debugConstructors) printf("end of %s\n",__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00062 }
00063 
00064 PlanePolygon::~PlanePolygon()
00065 {
00066   if(debugConstructors) printf("start of %s\n",__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00067   normals2D.clear(); 
00068   edgeDir2D.clear(); 
00069   edgeLengths.clear();
00070   offsets2D.clear();
00071   pixelLocs.clear();
00072   vertices.clear(); 
00073   vertices2D.clear(); 
00074   if(debugConstructors) printf("end of %s\n",__PRETTY_FUNCTION__);
00075 }
00076 
00077 bool PlanePolygon::computePlaneParameters(vector< vector3f >& points)
00078 {
00079   static const bool debug = true;
00080   using namespace Eigen;
00081   static Matrix3d m, eigenVectors;
00082   static Vector3d eigenValues;
00083   static SelfAdjointEigenSolver<Matrix3d> solver;
00084   
00085   vector3f p;
00086   double n = double(points.size());
00087   
00088   sum_xx = 0.0;
00089   sum_yy = 0.0;
00090   sum_zz = 0.0;
00091   sum_xy = 0.0;
00092   sum_xz = 0.0;
00093   sum_yz = 0.0;
00094   unsigned int i;
00095   
00096   p0.zero();
00097   for(i=0; i<points.size(); i++){
00098     p0 += points[i];
00099   }
00100   p0/=n;
00101   // Compute statistics required to construct the Scatter Matrix
00102   for(i=0; i<points.size(); i++){
00103     p = points[i];
00104     sum_xx += sq(p.x);
00105     sum_yy += sq(p.y);
00106     sum_zz += sq(p.z);
00107     sum_xy += p.x*p.y;
00108     sum_xz += p.x*p.z;
00109     sum_yz += p.y*p.z;
00110   }
00111   
00112   double invN = 1.0/n;
00113   
00114   m(0,0) = invN*sum_xx - p0.x*p0.x;
00115   m(0,1) = invN*sum_xy - p0.x*p0.y;
00116   m(0,2) = invN*sum_xz - p0.x*p0.z;
00117   m(1,0) = invN*sum_xy - p0.x*p0.y;
00118   m(1,1) = invN*sum_yy - p0.y*p0.y;
00119   m(1,2) = invN*sum_yz - p0.y*p0.z;
00120   m(2,0) = invN*sum_xz - p0.x*p0.z;
00121   m(2,1) = invN*sum_yz - p0.y*p0.z;
00122   m(2,2) = invN*sum_zz - p0.z*p0.z;
00123   solver.compute(m);
00124   eigenVectors = solver.eigenvectors();
00125   eigenValues = solver.eigenvalues();
00126   
00127   double minEig=0, midEig=0, maxEig=0;
00128   int minInd=-1, midInd=-1, maxInd=-1;
00129   for(int i=0; i<3; i++){
00130     if(minEig>eigenValues(i) || minInd<0){
00131       minEig = eigenValues(i);
00132       minInd = i;
00133     }
00134     if(maxEig<eigenValues(i) || maxInd<0){
00135       maxEig = eigenValues(i);
00136       maxInd = i;
00137     }
00138   }
00139   
00140   midInd = 3 - (minInd+maxInd);
00141   midEig = eigenValues(midInd);
00142   
00143   conditionNumber = midEig/maxEig;
00144   
00145   if(minInd<0 || maxInd<0 || maxInd==minInd){
00146     // Ill-defined plane
00147     normal.zero();
00148     offset = 0.0;
00149     b1.zero();
00150     b2.zero();
00151     p0.zero();
00152     numPoints = 0.0;
00153     if(debug) printf("Ill defined plane!\n");
00154     return false;
00155   }
00156   
00157   
00158   if(debug && false){
00159     printf("Planar points:\n");
00160     for(i=0; i<points.size(); i++){
00161       printf("%f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(points[i]));
00162     }
00163     printf("\nEigenvalues order: %d %d %d\n",minInd,midInd,maxInd);
00164     printf("\nCentroid: %f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(p0));
00165     cout<<"\nMatrix:\n"<<m<<"\n\nEigenValues:\n"<<eigenValues<<"\n\nEigenVectors:\n"<<eigenVectors<<"\n\n";
00166   }
00167   
00168   n = n;
00169   normal.set(eigenVectors(0,minInd), eigenVectors(1,minInd), eigenVectors(2,minInd),0.0);
00170   normal.normalize();
00171   if(normal.dot(p0)<0.0)
00172     normal = -normal;  
00173   offset = -normal.dot(p0);
00174   b1.set(eigenVectors(0,maxInd), eigenVectors(1,maxInd), eigenVectors(2,maxInd),0.0);
00175   b2.set(eigenVectors(0,midInd), eigenVectors(1,midInd), eigenVectors(2,midInd),0.0);
00176   sum_xx = invN*sum_xx;
00177   sum_yy = invN*sum_yy;
00178   sum_zz = invN*sum_zz;
00179   sum_xy = invN*sum_xy;
00180   sum_xz = invN*sum_xz;
00181   sum_yz = invN*sum_yz;
00182   return true;
00183 }
00184 
00185 bool PlanePolygon::constructConvexPoly(vector< vector3f >& points)
00186 {
00187   static const bool debug = true;
00188   if(points.size()<3){
00189     if(debug) printf("Too few points!\n");
00190     return false; //Can't construct a polygon with less than 3 vertices!
00191   }
00192   
00193   vector<vector2f> &points2d = vertices2D;
00194   points2d.clear();
00195   
00196   for(unsigned int i=0; i<points.size(); i++){
00197     vector2f p(b1.dot(points[i]-p0), b2.dot(points[i]-p0));
00198     points2d.push_back(p);
00199   }
00200   vertices2D = grahamsScan.run(points2d);
00201   
00202   unsigned int N = vertices2D.size();
00203   normals2D.resize(N);
00204   offsets2D.resize(N);
00205   vertices.resize(N);
00206   
00207   vector3f p;
00208   min2D.setAll(FLT_MAX);
00209   max2D.setAll(-FLT_MAX);
00210   for(unsigned int i=0; i<N; i++){
00211     p = vertices2D[i].x*b1 + vertices2D[i].y*b2 + p0;
00212     min2D.x = min(min2D.x,vertices2D[i].x);
00213     min2D.y = min(min2D.y,vertices2D[i].y);
00214     max2D.x = max(max2D.x,vertices2D[i].x);
00215     max2D.y = max(max2D.y,vertices2D[i].y);
00216     vertices[i] = p;
00217     normals2D[i] = (vertices2D[(i+1)%N]-vertices2D[i]).perp().norm();
00218     offsets2D[i] = -normals2D[i].dot(vertices2D[i]);
00219     if(normals2D[i].dot(vertices2D[(i+2)%N])+offsets2D[i]<0.0){
00220       normals2D[i] = -normals2D[i];
00221       offsets2D[i] = -offsets2D[i];
00222     }
00223   }
00224   corners[0] = p0 + b1*min2D.x + b2*min2D.y;
00225   corners[1] = p0 + b1*max2D.x + b2*max2D.y;
00226   corners[2] = p0 + b1*max2D.x + b2*min2D.y;
00227   corners[3] = p0 + b1*min2D.x + b2*max2D.y;
00228   width = 0.5*(max2D.x - min2D.x);
00229   height = 0.5*(max2D.y - min2D.y);
00230   if(width<=0.0 || height<=0.0){
00231     if(debug) printf("zero size polygon! width: %f, height:%f\n",width, height);
00232     return false;
00233   }
00234   return true;
00235 }
00236 
00237 double PlanePolygon::distFromPlane(vector3f p)
00238 {
00239   return fabs(p.dot(normal) + offset);
00240 }
00241 
00242 vector3f PlanePolygon::rayFromPlane(vector3f p)
00243 {
00244   return normal*(p.dot(normal)+offset);
00245 }
00246 
00247 
00248 bool PlanePolygon::liesAlongside(const vector3f& p) const
00249 {
00250   vector2f p2 = projectOnto(p);
00251   bool interior = true;
00252   if(normals2D.size() != offsets2D.size() || offsets2D.size() != vertices2D.size()){
00253     printf("Vector size mismatch in %s normals2D.size():%d offsets2D.size():%d vertices2D.size():%d\n",__PRETTY_FUNCTION__,int(normals2D.size()), int(offsets2D.size()), int(vertices2D.size()));
00254     exit(1);
00255   }
00256   for(unsigned int i=0; i<normals2D.size() && interior; i++){
00257     interior = (normals2D[i].dot(p2)+offsets2D[i])>0.0;
00258   }
00259   return interior;
00260 }
00261 
00262 void PlanePolygon::merge(PlanePolygon& poly2)
00263 {  
00264   static const bool debug = false;
00265   using namespace Eigen;
00266   
00267   double newNumPoints = numPoints + poly2.numPoints;
00268   vector3d p0Double = (numPoints*vector3d(V3COMP(p0)) + poly2.numPoints*vector3d(V3COMP(poly2.p0)))/newNumPoints;
00269   
00270   // Compute statistics required to construct the MI tensor
00271   
00272   double weight1 = numPoints/newNumPoints, weight2 = poly2.numPoints/newNumPoints;
00273   
00274   sum_xx = weight1*sum_xx + weight2*poly2.sum_xx;
00275   sum_yy = weight1*sum_yy + weight2*poly2.sum_yy;
00276   sum_zz = weight1*sum_zz + weight2*poly2.sum_zz;
00277   sum_xy = weight1*sum_xy + weight2*poly2.sum_xy;
00278   sum_xz = weight1*sum_xz + weight2*poly2.sum_xz;
00279   sum_yz = weight1*sum_yz + weight2*poly2.sum_yz;
00280   
00281   m(0,0) = sum_xx - p0Double.x*p0Double.x;
00282   m(0,1) = sum_xy - p0Double.x*p0Double.y;
00283   m(0,2) = sum_xz - p0Double.x*p0Double.z;
00284   m(1,0) = sum_xy - p0Double.x*p0Double.y;
00285   m(1,1) = sum_yy - p0Double.y*p0Double.y;
00286   m(1,2) = sum_yz - p0Double.y*p0Double.z;
00287   m(2,0) = sum_xz - p0Double.x*p0Double.z;
00288   m(2,1) = sum_yz - p0Double.y*p0Double.z;
00289   m(2,2) = sum_zz - p0Double.z*p0Double.z;
00290   
00291   solver.compute(m);
00292   eigenVectors = solver.eigenvectors();
00293   eigenValues = solver.eigenvalues();
00294   
00295   double minEig=0, midEig=0, maxEig=0;
00296   int minInd=-1, midInd=-1, maxInd=-1;
00297   for(int i=0; i<3; i++){
00298     if(minEig>eigenValues(i) || minInd<0){
00299       minEig = eigenValues(i);
00300       minInd = i;
00301     }
00302     if(maxEig<eigenValues(i) || maxInd<0){
00303       maxEig = eigenValues(i);
00304       maxInd = i;
00305     }
00306   }
00307   
00308   midInd = 3 - (minInd+maxInd);
00309   midEig = eigenValues(midInd);
00310   
00311   if(debug){
00312     printf("\nEigenvalues order: %d %d %d\n",minInd,midInd,maxInd);
00313     printf("\nCentroid: %f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(p0Double));
00314     std::cout<<"\nMatrix:\n"<<m<<"\n\nEigenValues:\n"<<eigenValues<<"\n\nEigenVectors:\n"<<eigenVectors<<"\n\n";
00315     //exit(0);
00316   }
00317   
00318   numPoints = newNumPoints;
00319   normal.set(eigenVectors(0,minInd), eigenVectors(1,minInd), eigenVectors(2,minInd),0.0);
00320   normal.normalize();
00321   p0.set(V3COMP(p0Double));
00322   if(normal.dot(p0) <0.0)
00323     normal = -normal;
00324   offset = -normal.dot(p0);
00325   b1.set(eigenVectors(0,maxInd), eigenVectors(1,maxInd), eigenVectors(2,maxInd),0.0);
00326   b2.set(eigenVectors(0,midInd), eigenVectors(1,midInd), eigenVectors(2,midInd),0.0);
00327   
00328   vector<vector2f> points2d;
00329   points2d.clear();
00330   
00331   for(unsigned int i=0; i<vertices.size(); i++){
00332     vector2f p(b1.dot(vertices[i]-p0), b2.dot(vertices[i]-p0));
00333     points2d.push_back(p);
00334   }
00335   for(unsigned int i=0; i<poly2.vertices.size(); i++){
00336     vector2f p(b1.dot(poly2.vertices[i]-p0), b2.dot(poly2.vertices[i]-p0));
00337     points2d.push_back(p);
00338   }
00339   
00340   vertices2D = grahamsScan.run(points2d);
00341   
00342   unsigned int N = vertices2D.size();
00343   normals2D.resize(N);
00344   offsets2D.resize(N);
00345   vertices.resize(N);
00346   vector3f p;
00347   min2D.setAll(FLT_MAX);
00348   max2D.setAll(-FLT_MAX);
00349   for(unsigned int i=0; i<vertices2D.size(); i++){
00350     p = vertices2D[i].x*b1 + vertices2D[i].y*b2 + p0;
00351     min2D.x = min(min2D.x,vertices2D[i].x);
00352     min2D.y = min(min2D.y,vertices2D[i].y);
00353     max2D.x = max(max2D.x,vertices2D[i].x);
00354     max2D.y = max(max2D.y,vertices2D[i].y);
00355     vertices[i] = p;
00356     normals2D[i] = (vertices2D[(i+1)%N]-vertices2D[i]).perp().norm();
00357     offsets2D[i] = -normals2D[i].dot(vertices2D[i]);
00358     if(normals2D[i].dot(vertices2D[(i+2)%N])+offsets2D[i]<0.0){
00359       normals2D[i] = -normals2D[i];
00360       offsets2D[i] = -offsets2D[i];
00361     }
00362   }
00363   corners[0] = p0 + b1*min2D.x + b2*min2D.y;
00364   corners[1] = p0 + b1*max2D.x + b2*max2D.y;
00365   corners[2] = p0 + b1*max2D.x + b2*min2D.y;
00366   corners[3] = p0 + b1*min2D.x + b2*max2D.y;
00367   width = 0.5*(max2D.x - min2D.x);
00368   height = 0.5*(max2D.y - min2D.y);
00369   
00370   if(normals2D.size() != offsets2D.size() || offsets2D.size() != vertices2D.size()){
00371     printf("normals2D.size():%d offsets2D.size():%d vertices2D.size():%d\n",int(normals2D.size()), int(offsets2D.size()), int(vertices2D.size()));
00372     exit(3);
00373   }
00374 }
00375 
00376 void PlanePolygon::merge(vector< PlanePolygon >& polygons)
00377 {
00378   static const bool debug = false;
00379   using namespace Eigen;
00380   
00381   double newNumPoints = numPoints;
00382   vector3d p0Double = numPoints*vector3d(V3COMP(p0));
00383   for(unsigned int i=0; i<polygons.size(); i++){
00384     newNumPoints += polygons[i].numPoints;
00385     p0Double += polygons[i].numPoints*vector3d(V3COMP(polygons[i].p0));
00386   }
00387   p0Double = p0Double/newNumPoints;
00388   
00389   // Compute statistics required to construct the MI tensor
00390   
00391   double weight = numPoints/newNumPoints;
00392   
00393   sum_xx = weight*sum_xx;
00394   sum_xy = weight*sum_xy;
00395   sum_xz = weight*sum_xz;
00396   sum_yy = weight*sum_yy;
00397   sum_yz = weight*sum_yz;
00398   sum_zz = weight*sum_zz;
00399   
00400   for(unsigned int i=0; i<polygons.size(); i++){
00401     weight = polygons[i].numPoints/newNumPoints;
00402     sum_xx += weight*polygons[i].sum_xx;
00403     sum_xy += weight*polygons[i].sum_xy;
00404     sum_xz += weight*polygons[i].sum_xz;
00405     sum_yy += weight*polygons[i].sum_yy;
00406     sum_yz += weight*polygons[i].sum_yz;
00407     sum_zz += weight*polygons[i].sum_zz;
00408   }
00409   
00410   m(0,0) = sum_xx - p0Double.x*p0Double.x;
00411   m(0,1) = sum_xy - p0Double.x*p0Double.y;
00412   m(0,2) = sum_xz - p0Double.x*p0Double.z;
00413   m(1,0) = sum_xy - p0Double.x*p0Double.y;
00414   m(1,1) = sum_yy - p0Double.y*p0Double.y;
00415   m(1,2) = sum_yz - p0Double.y*p0Double.z;
00416   m(2,0) = sum_xz - p0Double.x*p0Double.z;
00417   m(2,1) = sum_yz - p0Double.y*p0Double.z;
00418   m(2,2) = sum_zz - p0Double.z*p0Double.z;
00419   
00420   solver.compute(m);
00421   eigenVectors = solver.eigenvectors();
00422   eigenValues = solver.eigenvalues();
00423   
00424   double minEig=0, midEig=0, maxEig=0;
00425   int minInd=-1, midInd=-1, maxInd=-1;
00426   for(int i=0; i<3; i++){
00427     if(minEig>eigenValues(i) || minInd<0){
00428       minEig = eigenValues(i);
00429       minInd = i;
00430     }
00431     if(maxEig<eigenValues(i) || maxInd<0){
00432       maxEig = eigenValues(i);
00433       maxInd = i;
00434     }
00435   }
00436   
00437   midInd = 3 - (minInd+maxInd);
00438   midEig = eigenValues(midInd);
00439   
00440   if(debug){
00441     printf("\nEigenvalues order: %d %d %d\n",minInd,midInd,maxInd);
00442     printf("\nCentroid: %f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(p0Double));
00443     std::cout<<"\nMatrix:\n"<<m<<"\n\nEigenValues:\n"<<eigenValues<<"\n\nEigenVectors:\n"<<eigenVectors<<"\n\n";
00444     //exit(0);
00445   }
00446   
00447   numPoints = newNumPoints;
00448   normal.set(eigenVectors(0,minInd), eigenVectors(1,minInd), eigenVectors(2,minInd),0.0);
00449   normal.normalize();
00450   p0.set(V3COMP(p0Double));
00451   if(normal.dot(p0) <0.0)
00452     normal = -normal;
00453   offset = -normal.dot(p0);
00454   b1.set(eigenVectors(0,maxInd), eigenVectors(1,maxInd), eigenVectors(2,maxInd),0.0);
00455   b2.set(eigenVectors(0,midInd), eigenVectors(1,midInd), eigenVectors(2,midInd),0.0);
00456   
00457   vector<vector2f> points2d;
00458   points2d.clear();
00459   
00460   for(unsigned int i=0; i<vertices.size(); i++){
00461     vector2f p(b1.dot(vertices[i]-p0), b2.dot(vertices[i]-p0));
00462     points2d.push_back(p);
00463   }
00464   for(unsigned int i=0; i<polygons.size(); i++){
00465     for(unsigned int j=0; j<polygons[i].vertices.size(); j++){
00466       vector2f p(b1.dot(polygons[i].vertices[j]-p0), b2.dot(polygons[i].vertices[j]-p0));
00467       points2d.push_back(p);
00468     }
00469   }
00470   
00471   vertices2D = grahamsScan.run(points2d);
00472   
00473   unsigned int N = vertices2D.size();
00474   normals2D.resize(N);
00475   offsets2D.resize(N);
00476   vertices.resize(N);
00477   vector3f p;
00478   min2D.setAll(FLT_MAX);
00479   max2D.setAll(-FLT_MAX);
00480   for(unsigned int i=0; i<vertices2D.size(); i++){
00481     p = vertices2D[i].x*b1 + vertices2D[i].y*b2 + p0;
00482     min2D.x = min(min2D.x,vertices2D[i].x);
00483     min2D.y = min(min2D.y,vertices2D[i].y);
00484     max2D.x = max(max2D.x,vertices2D[i].x);
00485     max2D.y = max(max2D.y,vertices2D[i].y);
00486     vertices[i] = p;
00487     normals2D[i] = (vertices2D[(i+1)%N]-vertices2D[i]).perp().norm();
00488     offsets2D[i] = -normals2D[i].dot(vertices2D[i]);
00489     if(normals2D[i].dot(vertices2D[(i+2)%N])+offsets2D[i]<0.0){
00490       normals2D[i] = -normals2D[i];
00491       offsets2D[i] = -offsets2D[i];
00492     }
00493   }
00494   corners[0] = p0 + b1*min2D.x + b2*min2D.y;
00495   corners[1] = p0 + b1*max2D.x + b2*max2D.y;
00496   corners[2] = p0 + b1*max2D.x + b2*min2D.y;
00497   corners[3] = p0 + b1*min2D.x + b2*max2D.y;
00498   width = 0.5*(max2D.x - min2D.x);
00499   height = 0.5*(max2D.y - min2D.y);
00500   
00501   if(normals2D.size() != offsets2D.size() || offsets2D.size() != vertices2D.size()){
00502     printf("normals2D.size():%d offsets2D.size():%d vertices2D.size():%d\n",int(normals2D.size()), int(offsets2D.size()), int(vertices2D.size()));
00503     exit(3);
00504   }
00505 }
00506 
00507 void PlanePolygon::transform(vector3f translation, Quaternionf rotation)
00508 {
00509   GVector::matrix3d<float> M;
00510   GVector::transformMatrix<float>(rotation, translation, M);
00511   transform(M);
00512 }
00513 
00514 void PlanePolygon::transform(const GVector::matrix3d< float > &M)
00515 {
00516   static const bool debug = false;
00517   Eigen::Matrix3d R;
00518   Eigen::Vector3d t(M.m14,M.m24,M.m34),p(p0.x,p0.y,p0.z);
00519   
00520   if(debug){
00521     printf("\nTransform Matrix:\n");
00522     printf("%.6f %.6f %.6f %.6f \n",M.m11,M.m12,M.m13,M.m14);
00523     printf("%.6f %.6f %.6f %.6f \n",M.m21,M.m22,M.m23,M.m24);
00524     printf("%.6f %.6f %.6f %.6f \n",M.m31,M.m32,M.m33,M.m34);
00525     printf("%.6f %.6f %.6f %.6f \n",M.m41,M.m42,M.m43,M.m44);
00526     //exit(0);
00527     printf("\nbefore:\n");
00528     printf("p0: %f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(p0));
00529     printf("normal: %f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(normal));
00530     printf("b1: %f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(b1));
00531     printf("b2: %f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(b2));
00532     printf("xx:%f xy:%f xz:%f yy:%f yz:%f zz:%f\n",sum_xx,sum_xy,sum_xz,sum_yy,sum_yz,sum_zz);
00533   }
00534   // transform points
00535   for(unsigned int i=0; i<vertices.size(); i++){
00536     vertices[i] = vertices[i].transform(M);
00537   }
00538   
00539   // transform normals, basis vectors and centroid
00540   p0 = p0.transform(M);
00541   normal.w=0.0;
00542   normal = normal.transform(M);
00543   b1 = b1.transform(M);
00544   b2 = b2.transform(M);
00545   
00546   // transform scatter matrix elements
00547   R(0,0) = M.m11;
00548   R(0,1) = M.m12;
00549   R(0,2) = M.m13;
00550   R(1,0) = M.m21;
00551   R(1,1) = M.m22;
00552   R(1,2) = M.m23;
00553   R(2,0) = M.m31;
00554   R(2,1) = M.m32;
00555   R(2,2) = M.m33;
00556   
00557   m(0,0) = sum_xx;
00558   m(0,1) = sum_xy;
00559   m(0,2) = sum_xz;
00560   m(1,0) = sum_xy;
00561   m(1,1) = sum_yy;
00562   m(1,2) = sum_yz;
00563   m(2,0) = sum_xz;
00564   m(2,1) = sum_yz;
00565   m(2,2) = sum_zz;
00566   
00567   m = R*m*R.transpose() + t*p.transpose()*R.transpose() + R*p*t.transpose() + t*t.transpose();
00568   
00569   sum_xx = m(0,0);
00570   sum_xy = m(0,1);
00571   sum_xz = m(0,2);
00572   sum_yy = m(1,1);
00573   sum_yz = m(1,2);
00574   sum_zz = m(2,2);
00575   
00576   if(debug){
00577     printf("\nafter:\n");
00578     printf("p0: %f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(p0));
00579     printf("normal: %f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(normal));
00580     printf("b1: %f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(b1));
00581     printf("b2: %f,%f,%f\n",V3COMP(b2));
00582     printf("xx:%f xy:%f xz:%f yy:%f yz:%f zz:%f\n\n",sum_xx,sum_xy,sum_xz,sum_yy,sum_yz,sum_zz);
00583   }
00584 }
00585 
00586 vector3f PlanePolygon::intersect(vector3f l0, vector3f l)
00587 {
00588   //Implemented from:
00589   // http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Line-plane_intersection&oldid=458252030#Algebraic_form
00590   float d = (p0-l0).dot(normal)/l.dot(normal);
00591   return d*l+l0;
00592 }
